form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend the annual comment period for payment rates under Medicare Advantage.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securing Fairness in Regulatory Timing Act of 2015.

section.header: Extending the annual comment period for payment rates under Medicare Advantage
section.text: Section 1853(b)(2) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–23(b)(2)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting (or, in 2017 and each subsequent year, at least 60 days) after 45 days; and
by inserting (in 2017 and each subsequent year, of no less than 30 days) after opportunity.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 10, 2015.
